participant_1.background:
I am widowed.
my dad works in the automotive industry.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
i am in a motorcycle club.
I've been at my job for three years, and I love it!

participant_2.background:
I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity.
i like to draw and paint in my spare time.
i love owning nice office supplies.
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.

content.text: Hey, I'm a widow and I like to decorate Christmas trees.
I'm so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home.
that's great, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw and paint in my spare time, I'm also into interior decorating.
That's cool, I like to ride motorcycles.
I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity, but I'm trying to embrace my culture.
That's good, everyone should be proud of who they are.
I try to be, but it's hard sometimes.
It's okay, we all have our struggles.
Thanks for talking to me, I feel better now.
You're welcome, I'm glad I could help.
